reviews.text: This movie is must watch movie, music and direction is awesome. Movie has perfect message to give Live your dream. Very Inspirational story.Verdict Must watch
Very good story so beautifully picterized music so good very nice movie to see with family and also inspiring story
This movie deserve Oscar , better than slumdog millionaire
Congratulations to Shivhare for making a movie with kids and making his own story come live.
Must watch movie, the performance was outstanding.
Congratulations Atakn chatakn team. You all did very well. I saw this movie 2 times and I really want to see it another time.. thank you director sir for this wonderful movie.

I'm obliged to Vishakhaji and Soumyaji. Its not that my daughter Aayesha(Lata) is there but its a best implementation of story in kids hearts and so as in film and knowledge of attraction points at all steps of shoot, tend all kids to give best which was required for film, situations and songs. I loved a lot and request all to see this movie and give best reviews what you feel about it to support these kids to grow ahead. God bless all attached with Atkan Chatkan. Dreamit..Liveit..
I really appreciate the screenplay. After a long time there has been a movie that you can see with family.
After a long time we watched a good film. Best wishes to all Including Director, writer, producer, They introduced us to a good cinema....
If music makes your soul happy, Atkan Chatkan cannot be missed. It's a heartfelt ode to friendship and resounding belief in our dreams.Direction & Cinematography 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻

Among lots of depressing dark content's suffocation on OTT platform these days, here is Fresh Air with Inspiring story and Musical treat to Ear... And performances of all the Child Artists are Marvelous..It needs courage to make such a film.Kudos to Director and Producer.
Superb & must watch movie, Inspiring for kids, story line is very clear, written by director, all the cast done well done job specially kids, Will really inspire your kids Must watch👍

Congratulations to director Shiv Hare for giving such an inspirational story. The best thing is that Guddu chose to work rather than beg and he inspired his friends also to work. Excellent direction waiting for some more inspirational projects from you.
Amazing and Fabulous nice can't express in some Words .Thank You
Worth watching. Movie is very sweet . Directions could be more good. Still best ott release in recent times.
Just simply superb.. excellent story , screenplay & out of the box music.
A perfect Inspirational tale of 5 kids achieving so many things without having proper resources....Music By Sivamani ji Makes the music Vast And Beautiful ....a must watch Movie

The story of Guddu and his friends chuttan, madhave and the gang of street musicians is an inspiring tale of music, friendship and determination, the music by drums shivamani is soothing and it takes you back to your childhood.
This is a super awesome movie, with a descent message.. I believe its an Oscar Material.Had there been one super star the movie could have HIT the Box office like Taare Zameen Par .

This movie made me truly cry..this is the real raw film.society need this type of film .....great job🙏🙏🙏🙏
A Very beautiful clean & clear musical movie with a good plot n direction, acted very well by every characters. AR's music 🎶 was mesmerizing
Beautifully directed inspirational movie. Good acting kids.
What a movie,awesome, inspirational. Shiv Hare Sir,you did well... awesome. Great Work Sir,Hats off...Now I am waiting for your next movie

All characters are very good. Superb movie and superb work done by whole team.
It is a beautiful movie very inspirational and to enjoy with the family with a cast of wonderful actors.

Never seen such a lovely and honest film...Everything is so simply perfect ...It strikes a chord beautifully ..Wonderful portrayal of childhood emotions. Great story ...Superb direction ...Amazing music and wonderful cast makes it a must watch family film. 10 out of 10

Life never has been a bed of roses but with hope and courage, one can overcome all the difficulties in one's life. That's why it is said, 'hope is the only thing stronger than fear.' 'Atkan Chatkan' establishes this principle strongly and positively. Moreover, this film keep alive the hope for good cinema too. Kudos to Shiv Hare and the team. !
Appealing story line which make us believe that dreams come true irrespective of struggle and lack of opportunities. If we believe in our self then anything can be possible.
Great story!! A must see movie especially in these hard times.
NORTH To SOUTH....I really love this movie. Excellent story and cast.All the very best for all of u.

The Story of Atkan Chatkan movie is very interesting and admirable. Work of all the child actors is very praiseworthy . The passion of all of them towards their work can be seen easily at every second of the movie. A Meritorious work of art

This movie deserves to be watched only bcoz of the amazing acting skill put forward by the kid casts. Music is also absolutely fantastic after all AR Rahman's magical touch exist. Direction could have been improved. Movie is stretched beyond 2 hours unnecessarily. It would have been better if it was like 90 minutes long. But it's still decent and outperforming if compared to scum directed by Karan Johar.
A nice storytelling with a subtle message exubering immense positivity.
Watched such a fantastic movie after long time. Good story.
Amazing to watch such a master piece. Loved everyone's performance. Very organic story.
Such a beautiful movie cudnt skip a single part....Its a must watch but yeah sit with a tissue paper you will definitely cry with joy ❤❤
Heart touching story.. I saw this movie with my family and friends and I must say it's a wonderful movie..
Awesome. Must watch. Everyone should go for this. An interesting film.

Should definitely watch great direction and the picturization of movie is nice.
A must watch, story of talent getting its right place despite all odds.
Good to see the real emotions. Good to watch. Best movie

The concept and storyline is quite relatable to most of us. It shows the journey and struggle of those who try to do something different from rest of the world. Must watch this movie!!
Excellent movie and music , story line is fabulous ..especially kids enjoyed it ...
Incredible story and music , our hearty congratulations to entire team....

Hello everyone I came across this incredible story that I would like to tell you all. It is a story of a little boy named Guddu, as little as you & me... he had little hands & little feet but had big challenges to face. But hey that was no problem... you know why he had a big big heart & a fabulous musical talent... Let's celebrate the movie 'Atkan Chatkan' ...well done Shivamani sir and Shiv Hare , Lydian and Ruthra UNNIKRISHNAN
Outstanding performances and great screenplay. Overall a must watch!
The movie is too good ..! Motivational and I was in tears.. must watch guys.. Story of kids achieving their dreams :) Get inspired and get going towards your dreams.
Really a great movie with a lot of great acting and emotions.
Inspirational movie with great music by Shiva Anna

Amazing movie....must watch...one of the finest films..Story is just fabulous..it may touch the heart .. It is very thoughtfuly directed,the actors have acted very well ... I loved every bit of it,the songs, story line , screen ply everything was upto the mark...A must watch movie Atkan chatkan ..
Atlkan Chatkan is a musical that will take you on a rhythmic journey of hope and dreams.Specially the soundtracks are amazing, brilliant composition by Mr. Shivamani must watch.. film
Very nice movie Enjoyed it Ending could have been better

Tanmay Chaturvedi is totally fraud in his real life. Vo online music classes ke liye amount leta aur classes nahi karata hai,sirf daily bahane karta hai, mujhse 2 months ke advance me paise manga, maine vishwas kar ke rs5000 de diye, 14 classes ke liye, lakin 2 months me sirf 4 classes hi karaye, wo bhi bahut peechhe pad kar,. First class sirf 10 mins ,ki karaiye , baki classes bhi 30 mins ki hi karayi,. Ab na hi phone uthata hai aur na hi koi reply karta hai, He is totally fraud , don't watch his movie, Only fraud person

This movie is one of the best movie produced by Hindi Cinema. And i wish this one gets nominated for Oscar and wins the same. Best part about this movie is that somewhere in your life, you have faced each and every character of this movie. You can relate yourself to a child who has gone through sweet and bitter time. Or you can relate yourself. Personally i liked two best scenes in the movie: 1. Ballon ko usaki spelling aati hai. 2. the kitni aawazein sunayi di.3 climax is the best all the song ...so versatile and amazing recommend each and every individual to watch this movie at least once in their lifetime.

Wow, Cinema at its best Thank you Shiv Hare for making this movie...Brilliant work from all actors specially the kid.Hats off Lokaa production !I seriously could not believe we could make movies like this i hope people at the Board whoever sends movie for Oscars send this one ...at least this one has a slight chance .Atkan Chatkan will sweep all awards there is this year.Best movie i think in last 15-16 years and till Lokaa production makes another one.

Such a wonderful film..What a superb Direction...awesome script ...beautifully explore...rich frame...soft n ultimate music...great act by each n every character...specially the leading kids...A must watch film...motivational film for kids and youngseter as well.Highly recommend

Soulful movie with inspiration, motivation, dream & passion...so versatile music i never heard in any children film till now...what a song narr ho all childhood memories i recall when i was in school...meri maa i cried while listening this, mann tu ...honestly no enough words to express.....its very good, amazing cinema ....good luck team
You will not regret watching it. Songs and music direction were good. Storyline was also good. But it was a bit dramatic. Some scenes were stretched. But can definitely be watched.
Its a insipring story of guddu and her team which set an example of success against of bad situations
Music, story all are fantastic . Simple and beautiful story
Beautiful movie...everyone should watch..child actors do their best performance

Review By Kamal KAn excellent direction, beautiful narration and an emotional ending. This movie deserves the best of applause. The director has done an out of the world job. At no point in the movie does he overshadow the kid. The best thing I love about the movie is the facial expressions of Kid. This kid is a genius and has filled life into the role of a music lover. Movie is so perfect, doting mom, lovable sister and a bad dad. The manifestation of problems has been toned beautifully and the way the kid is dreamed to get out the problems is artistic. Missing this movie would be a blunder.

The story was nice and the direction was much better took different locations and best expressions out from artist's hearts specially from Kids, songs by celebs and a competition of best music lover students shown in movie was also attractive. Motive to support poor kids and encourage them to grow with studies and their hobbies/abilities to develop ahead is a nice thought should have in all our hearts. Love to art doesn't relying on any prize or trophy but it's a gift by God never stop to grow and which's a respectful thinking.
Very simple easy going light hatred movie. Direction and learning was good.
AmazingNarr ho na niraash karo mann ko,Narr ho na niraash karo mann ko,Kuch kaam karo kuch kaam karoJag me rahke nij naam karo...

I am still overwhelmed after the show has long ended. It's has been an enriching roller coaster ride back to my childhood days. The emotions of the child artiste in the movie has left a big impression in me.He is truly amazing to say the least (the real hero of the movie). Lydian Nadshwaram did amazing part of this movie... & the songs 🎵🎵🎵🎧 Wowwwwww

Well, some films are bad, some are good. Some films are great, some are superb. But there are a handful of films that come once in a while to create a new landmark in the history of Cinema. They are above of those mere 'good' 'great' adjectives and the only way to describe them is by telling the person Go and see for yourself! Atkan Chatkan is among those rare & remarkable film that may change your life once you see it.So I'm not going to spend anymore words describing how brilliant the movie is and how you may end up crying not in sadness but in joy instead, the only thing I can say is watching AC is mandatory regardless of whoever you are and whatever you do you will relate with this masterpiece.

Bollywood has always been deprived of such movies. Shiv Hare, a talented director, a movie which is a bit different, and does it brilliantly. The movie starts with story of 10 year old, kid, guddu. Lydian Nadshwaram has played a role of a boy who is very poor and his father is bad. But his bit different than others and his mind always hear music in everything, very creative. The flow of movie is just awesome. It is full of emotions. Though the movie is about a kid, it is meant to be watched by parents along with their children. I think this movie certainly deserves a spot in IMDb top 100. Also after so many years, a Bollywood movie has given hope for an Oscar.
Nice movie... good story,direction,music,perfect casting.
Very nice movie for children.Must watch.It is a family Movies.
Very nice inspiring movie, family film ...Sabko dekhna chahiye...Telegram ji thank you

While the seriousness of the effort was evident in the film by the characters. Brilliant!
The two-hour-fifteen-minute film is directed by Shiva Hare. Worth watching!
The scattered brown, dirty-skinned faces of the children in the Attakkan chatkan leave nothing to the imagination.
Have to go through, really get down on your destiny. And when everything seems lost, it is saved.
He stumbles his way to a group of other street children and they form a band using all the street paraphernalia paraphernalia - broken pipes, plastic drums, etc.
In the opening sequence, they hear the sound of adulteration in a brass pot, wheat bran, finger ring on a glass of glass in a paan shop.
He works at a tea stall, but lives a life devoted to the pursuit of music.
Throw in a talented teacher who has a heart of gold. Lovely!
Children are happy to watch, even if they have to relive dialogues that are unrelated to this decade.
Atkan Chatkan, a phrase in Hindi, often used for alliterative purposes, is believed to lend a young, lively vibe.
Listen to 'AR Rahman's best' on your choice of music player. It's amazing too.
The film being presented by AR Rahman, expectations were high at the end of the musical, but even one cannot miss a humble kitty .
Lydian Nadaswaram must play the role of a contestant, which he tries his best.
Lydian Nadaswaram, who plays Guddu, is a talented pianist in real life.
Atkan Chatkan drives home the point that nothing can stop you from realising your dream, if you have the will and the skill.
The kids are a delight to watch, even if they have to regurgitate dialogues that don't belong to this decade.
The film is neither zestful nor happy. I really loved the mix version of all the emotions
Atkan Chatkan, a phrase in Hindi, which is often used for alliteration purposes, is supposed to lend a zesty, youthful vibe.
Give Atkan Chatkan a miss. Listen to 'the best of AR Rahman' on your choice of music player instead.
The expectations were high on the musical end, but even there one cannot recall even one hummable ditty.

Must watch This #MasterPiece ! So these day I am constantly on a lookout for 'offbeat ' movies from Bollywood , and never disappointed to what i unearth every time ! With lot of will I am trying to resist the mainstream commercial Bollywood tatti and with such lovely movies around I am glad to stick my will.Had #AtkanChatkan been made by big banners like Dharma productions , it would have been called the 'High School musical of India ' ... This is the true and real talent made on relatively low marketing budgets ..guys it's viewers and public like us who can make such underdog and quality movies a commercial success , help spread the word with power of social media !!!Thank you ZEE5 Premium , #ShivHare Sonu Nigam A.R. Rahman #ShivaMani Shivamani for giving us such an Wonderful piece of ART !
Fantastic movie with full of suspense. Full of dream, hope and compassion

Atkan Chatkan is the film which is all about music and that's the reason music lovers shouldn't miss this film at all. All 4 child actors were very good in the film. And If you don't know who the lead child actor is, just search 'Lydian Nadhaswaram' on Youtube, you'll be amazed.Now, the film started very well but so many cliché moments appeared in the 2nd half, let the film a little bit down. But, I think the film is made specially for the children and I'm sure they will enjoy every bit of it.

The dishevelled brown, dirt-streaked faces of the children in Atkan Chatkan leave nothing to the imagination.
Watch this inspiring story of Guddu, a child labourer, who forms a band with his friends.
A tale of young children who have a burning passion for music but do not have the means to fulfill their dreams.
Atkan Chatkan is a ZEE5 Original film starring Lydian Nadhaswaram, Yash Rane, Sachin Chaudhary, Tamanna Dipak and Ayesha Vindhara.
The most interesting part is the band unites his separated musician parents.
I love how they form a band to win a prestigious musical competition without using conventional instruments.
It is the story of a gifted kid Guddu, who along with his street kid friends.
The content is good.. Nice work by the child artists.

Nothing new a rehash of slumdog and secret superstar . Pretty predictable, poor choice of cast . The director picked up South Indian cast for a North Indian set movie . The movie fails to make the emotional connect with the audience.

Beautiful film i watched with my entire family ...they all are glued with story till end...specially this boy who never act or speak hindi in his life ...done the entire film so flawless ....its so remarkable. my family give 10/10 to the kids specially Guddu

Movie is engaging and motivating. Loved the kids acting. After a long time had a nice family movie and did watch with whole family. Guddu's acting/ movies music and Bachhan Ji's Song all thumbs up 👍. Must watch

The most negative thing of movie is casting of main character. He's from south & dialogues r in hindi.Someone like the actor from bhootnath 2 cud have been good choice.The other most negative thing is story in second half.

A nice attempt to make a film based on the good music that is made from different sounds with unused or discarded things.The content is good but the execution........Although the music is good, the direction and acting are not very good.

Tight story 3. Some relevant social message 4. and the USP ...something different that will blow your mind!! Here the USP is Shiv hare's direction and his total commitment to his script.This latest effort of Shiv Hare is simply brilliant! Told in a very simplistic manner the film touches your heart and takes you through a roller-coaster of emotions. Even though the protagonist has music love he hear music from his surroundings the story could have been of any child in any field. The movie speaks about the dream of a child. But, never once does it get preachy.There are many brilliant moments in the movie and will not spoil them for you by highlighting any one specifically.Watch this movie to realize a reality which most are oblivious to. Watch this movie for it's brilliant story, performance and direction. Watch this movie if u r an Lydian Nadshwaram & AR Rahman fan.. Watch this movie if u r not an AR fan and I promise u will become one after watching...and watch this movie to encourage such movies to be made in India and let the world acknowledge our cinema!

Its at times like this...i regret for not having better writing abilities....the best movie of the 2020 undoubtedly...when i say best...the best i've seen in any language.....and to say its the best movie of the YEAR...is an understatement.....its an amazing movie....and very honest..when u make movies like these u have to be honest and the characters have to be real....i cannot think of any other Indian movie that i have seen in ages thats as honest and real as this..and I didn't move until the credit roll stopped and the screen went blank...this movie is for anyone who likes kids....now who would not????....complete family movie...MUST WATCH for parents...shiv hare - 8/10, the kid - 10/10, kid's dad -10/10 mother 10/10i've never felt the casting for any Indian movie was so perfect after chak de.....now this movie beats it.....all the characters would score at least 8/10.....may be because...all of them were so real......shivamani - 10/8...awesome music...and the timing of the songs was just perfectShiv hare for the story/conceptVishakha Singh the producer - 10/10love u shiv....for this movie.....and i am so proud and now I will be a great fan of you n ur upcoming movies...thanks to u....we can say...India making some sensible movies....u rock boy!!!!!please don't miss this movie....tail piece - try real hard to stop the tearsaaaah........i loved the movie...5 out of 7 found this helpful Summary: Best Film after long time on children

The film contrasts the harsh realities of child labour with the dreaminess of the gang. Guddu sees a vision of himself in a bus: big smile, clean clothes, shiny guitar. His friends get by by begging on buses. One of them, Chuttan (Sachin Chaudhary), hangs currency notes as dreamcatchers. The band creates DIY instruments from junk: chimes, drums, xylophones. There's a buffet of everyday percussive sounds, which are rendered so well that the actual soundtrack - featuring Sonu Nigam, Hariharan and Amitabh Bachchan - fades in comparison.As a musical, Atkan Chatkan sticks strictly to template. A benign principal discovers the band and puts them in a competition. The role of Spruha Joshi, as an adjunct music teacher, is not hard to predict. It all leads up to a finale that can be seen from miles. Still, this is a fun film to sit through, owing largely to the energetic cast and Shivmani's zippy percussions. It's no surprise that two of the best passages play out silently, with just Guddu and his music. Words are an intrusion in his young composer's mind.
